thread.title: Manchester United take 16-year-old wonderkid Alex Timossi Andersson on week-long trial
thread.title_full: Manchester United take 16-year-old wonderkid Alex Timossi Andersson on week-long trial

author: Thomas Bristow
title: Manchester United take 16-year-old wonderkid Alex Timossi Andersson on week-long trial
text:
Get Manchester United FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Manchester United have this week taken 16-year-old wonderkid Alex Timossi Andersson on a week-long trial - and it's easy to see why. 
Helsingborg's manager Per-Ola Ljung confirmed on Wednesday that the young Swedish attacker has travelled to Manchester in order to impress Nicky Butt and co. 
But it's not just Man United who are keen on the youngster, last season Timossi Andersson was invited to train with Bayern Munich. 
The young Swede has since continued his development and made his senior debut for Helsingborg this season, playing a full 90 minutes in the Svenska Cupen. Alex Timossi Andersson (Photo: hif.se) 
"We can confirm that he is going to Manchester to visit United," said Helsingborg head coach Per-Ola Ljung via HD . 
"Manchester United have for some time wanted to meet Timossi Andersson, but it was important to not let it come between school. 
"We thought it was appropriate to do it now so he does not miss anything in school." poll loading Will Man United sign Alex Timossi Andersson? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
